# Dismount-MCDBootImage

Source: `source/Private/Workspace/BootImage/Dismount-MCDBootImage.ps1`

## Synopsis

Dismounts a Windows PE boot image.

## Description

Dismounts a previously mounted Windows PE boot.wim image. Can either save
changes or discard them based on the Save parameter. Uses the Dismount-WindowsImage
cmdlet for the dismount operation.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| MountPath | String | Yes | No | Directory path where the image is currently mounted. |
| Save | SwitchParameter | No | No | When specified, commits changes to the WIM file before dismounting. When not specified, changes are discarded. |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
Dismount-MCDBootImage -MountPath 'C:\WinPE\mount' -Save

Dismounts the boot image and saves all changes.
```

### Example 2

```powershell
Dismount-MCDBootImage -MountPath 'C:\WinPE\mount'

Dismounts the boot image and discards all changes.
```
